org.opendaylight.controller.sal.routing

Interface IRouting

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DijkstraImplementation

    public interface IRouting
    This interface provides APIs to manage and query the routing information

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Remove all routes and reset all state.
      void clearMaxThroughput()
      Remove all Max Throughput Routes and reset all state.
      Path getMaxThroughputRoute(Node src, Node dst)
      Returns a Max ThroughPut Path leading from the source to the destination
      Path getRoute(Node src, Node dst)
      Returns a Path leading from the source to the destination
      Path getRoute(Node src, Node dst, java.lang.Short Bw)
      Returns a Path leading from the source to the destination that meets the specified bandwidth
      void initMaxThroughput(java.util.Map<Edge,java.lang.Number> EdgeWeightMap)
      Initialization For Max Throughput

        dst - destination Node

            Node dst,

        dst - destination Node
        Bw - the bandwidth

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all routes and reset all state. USE CAREFULLY!

      • clearMaxThroughput

        void clearMaxThroughput()

      • initMaxThroughput

        void initMaxThroughput(java.util.Map<Edge,java.lang.Number> EdgeWeightMap)
        Initialization For Max Throughput
        Parameters:
        EdgeWeightMap - Map containing Edge and Corresponding Weight. Optional Param - if null, implementation specific weight calculation will be used.
